# get_tobii_pos { #DeToX.get_tobii_pos }

```python
get_tobii_pos(win, p, units=None)
```

Convert PsychoPy coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                   | Description                                                                                     | Default    |
|--------|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| win    | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size.                            | _required_ |
| p      | tuple                  | The PsychoPy coordinates to convert.                                                            | _required_ |
| units  | str                    | The units for the PsychoPy coordinates. Default is None, which uses the window's default units. | `None`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                           |
|--------|--------|---------------------------------------|
|        | tuple  | The converted Tobii ADCS coordinates. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description                              |
|--------|------------|------------------------------------------|
|        | ValueError | If the provided units are not supported. |
